I’m hungry I’m hungry

Our specialty is Halal

Growing up in Pakistan our Nani would make us incredible dishes on weekends, but her signature seasoning was Chutney Sauce, a combination of yogurt, mint leaves and marsalla that got the family together every time. Our Halal tradition has brought us thus far and we plan to continue our Nani's tradition through her kitchen legacy.
